messages.register.confirmationScreen.boxHeaderDes: {event, select, declaration {{eventType, select, birth {birth} death {death} other{birth}} declaration has been sent for review.} registration {{eventType, select, birth {birth} death {death} other{birth}} has been registered.} duplication {{eventType, select, birth {birth} death {death} other{birth}} has been registered.} rejection {{eventType, select, birth {birth} death {death} other{birth}} declaration has been rejected.} certificate {{eventType, select, birth {birth} death {death} other{birth}} certificate has been completed.} offline {{eventType, select, birth {birth} death {death} other{birth}} declaration will be sent when you reconnect.} other {{eventType, select, birth {birth} death {death} other{birth}}}
messages.register.confirmationScreen.trackingSect: {event, select, certificate {Certificates have been collected from your jurisdiction.} other {The informant will receive this number via SMS, but make sure they write it down and keep it safe. They should use the number as a reference if enquiring about their registration.} registration {The informant will receive this number via SMS with instructions on how and where to collect the certificate.} duplication{The informant will receive this number via SMS with instructions on how and where to collect the certificate.} rejection{The declaration agent will be informed about the reasons for rejection and instructed to follow up.} offline {The informant will receive the tracking ID number via SMS when the declaration has been sent for review.}}

{event, select, declaration {Tracking number:} registration {{eventType, select, birth {Birth} death {Death}} Registration Number:} duplication {{eventType, select, birth {Birth} death {Death}} Registration Number:} other {Tracking number:} certificate {} offline {Tracking number:}}
messages.register.eventInfo.birth.listItem0: I am here to complete the birth registration declaration for you.
messages.register.eventInfo.birth.listItem1: Once I complete the declaration, it will be sent to the registration office for review.
messages.register.eventInfo.birth.listItem2: Wait for an SMS to tell you when to visit the office to collect the certificate - Take your ID with you.
messages.register.eventInfo.birth.listItem3: Make sure you go and collect the certificate. A birth certificate is critical for this child, especially to make their life easy later on. It will help to access health services, school examinations and government benefits.
messages.register.eventInfo.event.title: Introduce the {eventType, select, birth{birth} death{death} other{birth}} registration process to the informant
messages.register.eventInfo.death.listItem0: I am here to complete the death registration declaration for you.
messages.register.eventInfo.death.listItem1: Once I complete the declaration, it will be sent to the registration office for review.
messages.register.eventInfo.death.listItem2: Wait for an SMS to tell you when to visit the office to collect the certificate - Take your ID with you.
messages.register.eventInfo.death.listItem3: Make sure you go and collect the certificate. A death certificate is critical to support with inheritance claims and to resolve the affairs of the deceased e.g. closing bank accounts and settling loans.

messages.review.actions.description: By registering you confirm that you have reviewed this declaration and satisfied it fulfils requirements required for registration.
messages.review.actions.description.confirmComple: By sending this declaration for review you confirm that the information has been reviewed by the informant and that they are aware that they will receive an SMS with a tracking ID and details of how to collect the birth certificate
messages.review.actions.description.confirmInComp:
By sending this incomplete declaration, there will be a digital record made.

Tell the informant that they will receive an SMS with a tracking ID. They will need this to complete the declaration at a registration office within 30 days. The informant will need to provide all mandatory information before the birth can be registered
messages.review.actions.desc.regConfComp:
By clicking register, you confirm that the information is correct and has been reviewed by the informant. The informant understands that it will be used to register the birth and for planning purposes.

By registering this birth, a birth certificate will be generated with your signature for issuance.
